name: Luis Herrera
resume: Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience who enjoys working in dynamic environments. Self-taught and proactive. Lover of technology and philosophy.

experience.description: Development of web solutions for different multinational companies, under responsibilities of layout (Tailwind, Ant Design, Material), frontend integration (Angular, ReactJs) and backend (NestJS); along with unit tests and e2e.
Development and integration of the new portal for VZOR. Technologies used: Angular 9, SCSS, Bootstrap.
Frontend development of a website for the creation of tokens on the Ethereum blockchain.

Development of a web application for a construction company in Laravel framework. Creation of a system for registering and monitoring merchandise. Responsible for the creation of layout and implementation of forms and validations, communication with the company's API and data display.

certifications: Machine Learning from Linear Models to Deep Learning
Architecture, Algorithms, and Protocols of a Quantum Computer and Quantum Internet
